articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Ryongsong Machine Complex
						
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Ryongsong Machine Complex, opening a bright prospect for the use of geothermal water.
					 Kim Jong Il went round the new geothermal equipment manufactured by the complex and acquainted himself in detail with their mechanism, the principle of their operation and technical specifications.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the one more signal success the workers of Ryongsong made in the efforts to build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living by successfully manufacturing cutting-edge geothermal equipment in a brief span of time by their own efforts and with their own technology.
					
					 The geothermal equipment made by the complex are highly efficient cutting-edge energy saving equipment capable of raising several times the heat utility factor while consuming less electricity than the existing heating and air conditioning equipment, he said, highly praising the officials, workers and technicians for having devoted themselves to the manufacture of new-type machines.
					
					 After giving field guidance to the complex, Kim Jong Il opened a bright prospect for the use of geothermal water in the country on the spot.
					
					 He said that ensuring the heating and air conditioning of buildings by use of geothermal water under ground is of great importance for providing people with convenient living conditions and enabling them to lead a highly civilized life while saving power and fuel such as electricity and coal as much as possible.
					
					 An active development and use of the said precious wealth of the country is a very important issue in ensuring the rapid development of the nation's economy and providing the people with a happy life, he said.
					
					 He stressed that in order to widely use geothermal water and let people greatly benefit from it industrial establishments including the Ryongsong Machine Complex should rapidly increase the production of geothermal equipment. 
					
					 He underlined the need for the scientific research institutes and universities to intensify the research into the use of geotherm, thoroughly establish a system for training technical talents and take state measures for positively encouraging the development and use of geothermal water.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all the party members and other working people in all fields and at all units including the workers of Ryongsong would bring about a new turn in the drive to accelerate the building of an economic power and improve the standard of people's of living.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, and Hyon Chol Hae, department director of the NDC.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 79th Birthday of KPA
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 79th Birthday of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present were senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of science, education, culture and art, public health and media organs, families of servicepersons, working people and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries, members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					  KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report at the meeting. 
					
					 The reporter said that nearly 80 years of the KPA is a glorious course in which it has been steadily strengthened into the main force of the Korean revolution under the leadership of the peerlessly great persons, always emerging victorious in the showdown with imperialism and the accomplishment of the socialist cause. It is also the sacred annals in which the KPA has made a glorious history of building the army of the leader and the party while preserving the tradition of loyalty created in the forests of Mt. Paektu generation after generation, he said.
					
					 During the whole course of his leadership over the Korean revolution, President Kim Il Sung held fast to the idea and principle of giving importance to the army and giving precedence to the military affairs and steadily built up the revolutionary armed forces and thus defeated the two imperialist formidable enemies and provided firm military guarantee for the victorious advance of the revolution and construction, the reporter said, adding: 
					
					 The feats the President performed to build the revolutionary armed forces while firmly adhering to the idea and line of attaching importance to the army in the whole period of his protracted leadership over the revolution will shine forever in the history of the country as they are the most precious of the revolutionary feats performed by him in his lifetime.
					
					 The KPA founded and strengthened by the President has entered a new higher stage of its development, glorifying the history of genuine continuity to the cause of army building under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Grasping the grim situation created due to the vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK and the requirement of the developing revolution in the 1990s, Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics in an all-round way with the KPA as the main force of revolution to usher in the greatest heyday of army building.
					
					 The KPA has grown to be the elite forces strong in idea and faith and the matchless combat ranks equipped with modern offensive and defensive means. The DPRK has turned into a politico-ideological power and world-leading military power, any aggression forces dare not pounce upon, and won victory after victory in the showdown with the U.S. and other imperialists. This is the biggest miracle and the great victory of Songun Korea provided by Kim Jong Il's original idea of attaching importance to the army and his distinguished Songun leadership.
					
					 The reporter stressed the importance to build a thriving socialist nation at an early date, achieve the independent reunification of the country and win a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers have staged madcap maneuvers for mounting surprisingly preemptive strike on the DPRK with various nuclear attack means and hundreds of thousands of troops involved, despite the strong protest of people at home and abroad, he said, and went on:
					
					 The KPA has already clarified its principled stand to cope with their ever-more reckless provocations.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors finally ignite a war against the DPRK, its revolutionary armed forces will give fullest play to the inexhaustible might of the revolutionary strong army of Mt. Paektu to wipe out the aggressors at one blow and achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: US Urged to Repeal Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
US Urged to Repeal Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea and organizations of Koreans in the U.S. including the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on April 13 sent an open letter to the U.S. House of Representatives in demand of the repeal of the "bill on designating again the north as sponsor of terrorism".
					 The letter charged that the U.S. House of Representatives worked out the bill under the pretext of the cases of "Cheonan" warship sinking and Yonphyong Island shelling.
					
					 This is a product of the U.S. extremely hostile policy toward the DPRK, it said.
					
					 The bill is aimed to scuttle dialogue between the DPRK and the U.S., the letter said, stressing that this hostile bill should be repealed without fail.

articles.title: Struggle for Independence and Reunification Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Independence and Reunification Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Society of April Revolution and the preparatory committee for the People's Strength for New Society in south Korea held a joint memorial service for the participants in the April 19 Popular Uprising in Seoul on Tuesday.
					 At the service speakers noted that they are recalling the historic significance of the uprising.
					
					 The social democratization is now facing a serious crisis, they said, adding that such reality asks all the people to rise up again as they did 51 years ago.
					
					 They called upon the people from all walks of life to get united as one and wage a dynamic struggle for independence, democracy and reunification as desired by the uprisers.

articles.title: Policy of Discriminating against Handicapped Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Policy of Discriminating against Handicapped Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The joint action group against the discrimination of handicapped in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on April 20, protesting the authorities' policy of discriminating against the handicapped.
					 At the rally speakers charged that the present "government" has not yet implemented its promise to adopt new policies for the sake of the handicapped.
					
					 We cannot but turn out in the action to terminate the authorities' policy of discrimination that inflicts sufferings on the handicapped and their families, they declared.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Russian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Vremya Perementeve on April 6 carried the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country". 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively touches on the ways for achieving the great unity of the whole Korean nation.
					
					 The ways call for founding a unified state through great national unity, achieving unity on the basis of love for nation and spirit of national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and ending all political disputes that trigger division and confrontation among fellow countrymen. They also call upon the north and the south to trust each other and unite and all Koreans to join hands on the road for national reunification irrespective of their differing idea and ism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 There were a joint seminar of Finnish political parties and organizations in Helsinki on April 13 and seminar, meeting, lecture and Korean book and photo exhibition in Cotonou, Portonobo and other regions of Benin between March 28 and April 14.
					
					On display at their venues were works of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits, books and photos showing the Korean army and people in the efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The participants in the joint seminar laid bouquets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finnish Mangyongdae Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung, in his report at the joint seminar said that the whole life of the President was that of the legendary great man who saved and defended the destiny of the country and the nation. It was also the history of great devotion as he built a country of the people and turned it into a socialist power, the reporter added. 
					
					 Chairman of the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism Hannu Harju, Chairman of the Finnish Communists' League Kalevi Wahrman and the honorary chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea spoke highly of the immortal exploits of the President. 
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and General Kim Jong Il's Works said in his report at a seminar that Kim Il Sung advanced the three charters for national reunification to provide a great programme for Korea's independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the joint seminar in Finland.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Austria and Germany released bulletins to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna carried in its bulletin on April 14 an article with the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The bulletin said that the President performed great exploits for the country and the nation, the times and history, recording his sacred revolutionary career in the annals of the 20th century. 
					
					 The President is praised as the father of all the Korean people and the eternal sun of mankind for his prominent idea and leadership and great love, it said, adding:
					
					 Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives as the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 The Hanover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany on April 13 carried in its bulletin a photo of the President and articles on his noble virtues and popular traits as the peerlessly great man who devoted all his life to the people.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced in Peru
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship carried the brief history of President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary activities in its bulletin on April 12.

articles.title: Japanese Politicians Visit Yasukuni Shrine in Group
articles.content:
Japanese Politicians Visit Yasukuni Shrine in Group
						
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Ultra-right politicians of Japan paid a group visit to "Yasukuni Shrine" on April 22.
					 54 dietmen belonging to the "Association of Dietmen for Visiting 'Yasukuni Shrine'" flocked to the shrine that day to stir up militarism.
					
					 Earlier, on Thursday the shrine was visited by the president and the vice-president of the Liberal Democratic Party. 
					
					 Such behavior aimed to realize Japan's foolish ambition for reinvasion by recalling the soul of militarism is arousing criticism and ridicule from the international community.

articles.title: Putin Calls for Nation's Increased Military Power
articles.content:
Putin Calls for Nation's Increased Military Power 
 Moscow, April 22 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin, in an annual report on the government's work on Wednesday, referred to the issue of increasing the defence capability of the country.
					 Fund three times over the past one will be allotted to carry out the plan for military equipment, he said, stressing that the order pursuant to the state's plan for military equipment and financial support to general enterprises of the defence industry should be implemented  by the appointed date.
					
					 The nation's armed forces should be fully rearmed for ten years to come, he said, adding that the defence complex of Russia has the capacity to provide the army with sophisticated weapons.

articles.title: Reserve Soldiers to Wear New Military Uniform in China
articles.content:
Reserve Soldiers to Wear New Military Uniform in China
 Beijing, April 22 (KCNA) -- Reserve soldiers of China will put on 07-style reserve military uniform from May 1.
					 This uniform is said to be identical to that of active soldier in form, but different only in mark.

articles.title: Brazilian President Calls for New World Order
articles.content:
Brazilian President Calls for New World Order
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff, addressing a ceremony on April 20, called for a more democratic international order.
					 "International institutions have become obsolete," she said, underlining the need to reform the UN Security Council.
					
					 She recalled that the recent 3rd BRICS summit laid out the goal of major emerging countries for a new world order adjusted to current realities.

articles.title: PLO Blasts US Behavior
articles.content:
PLO Blasts US Behavior
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Yasser Abed Rabbo, a Palestine Liberation Organization official, on April 20 condemned the U.S. unreasonable behavior.
					 On Tuesday, the U.S. said it rejected the Palestinian plan for the recognition from the United Nations, saying that the Palestinian state must come through a negotiated agreement with Israel.
					
					 He declared that Palestine will continue to work hard to gain its aim.
					
					 He called upon the international community to extend support to the Palestinian people in their struggle to build an independent state.

articles.title: Satellite Carrier Rocket Launched in India
articles.content:
Satellite Carrier Rocket Launched in India
						
 New Delhi, April 22 (KCNA) -- A carrier rocket loaded with three satellites was launched in India on April 20.
					 The rocket launching was successful, a space research institute of the country said, adding that the three satellites were put on space 822 km away from the earth.

articles.title: Acto central por el 79º aniversario de la fundación del EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 79º aniversario de la fundación del EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el día 24 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 79º aniversario de la fundación del Ejército Popular de Corea.
					Asistieron allí los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejército, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y órganos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educación, cultura y arte, salud pública, prensa e información, los familiares de los militares en servicio, trabajadores y compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomáticos de varios países, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los delegados de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					El informe de la ocasión estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buró Político del Comité Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					La historia de casi 80 años del EPC es una trayectoria orgullosa en que bajo la dirección de los Grandes Hombres sin iguales, este contingente logró siempre victorias en la confrontación antiimperialista y en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista mediante el fortalecimiento constante como grueso de la Revolución Coreana, y sagrados anales en que vino creando una orgullosa historia de la construcción del ejército del líder y del partido, manteniendo de generación en generación la tradición de fidelidad, creada en la selva del monte Paektu, señaló el informante.
					
					Durante todo el proceso histórico de su orientación sobre la Revolución Coreana, el Presidente Kim Il Sung consolidó incesantemente las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias manteniendo la idea y los principios de dar importancia al fusil, o sea, priorizar los asuntos militares, recordó y agregó que de esta manera, el Presidente venció a los dos imperialismos poderosos y garantizó con firmeza en lo militar el avance victorioso de la revolución y la construcción. 
					
					La proeza del Presidente en la construcción de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias realizada durante largo plazo de su guía sobre la revolución manteniendo con firmeza la idea y la línea de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas, es la más preciosa de entre los méritos revolucionarios acumulados durante toda su vida y brillará eternamente en los anales de la patria, dijo y continuó:
					
					El EPC, fundado y desarrollado por el Presidente, glorifica su historia de sucesión de la causa de construcción del ejército y entra en la nueva etapa más elevada de su desarrollo, gracias a la dirección del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolución mediante el Songun. 
					
					Al percatarse en la década de los 90 del siglo pasado de la demanda de la revolución en desarrollo y de la situación severa creada por las crueles maniobras de aplastamiento y aislamiento anti-RPDC de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas, el Dirigente practicó globalmente la política de Songun tomando al EPC por el grueso de la revolución, con lo cual abrió la era de máxima prosperidad de la construcción del ejército. 
					
					El EPC ha crecido como un ejército fuerte en la ideología y la convicción y un destacamento combativo sin rival dispuesto de todos los modernos medios de ataque y de defensa, mientras que nuestro país logra victoria tras victoria en la confrontación antiimperialista y antiyanqui haciendo alarde de la potencia ideo-política y la militar a que ninguna fuerza agresora se atreve a atacar. Este milagro y gran triunfo de la Corea del Songun residen en la original idea del Dirigente de dar importancia a los asuntos militares y en su destacada guía sobre la revolución mediante el Songun.
					
					Debemos construir lo más pronto posible la gran potencia próspera socialista bajo la bandera del Songun y lograr la reunificación independiente de la patria y el triunfo definitivo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas títeres surcoreanos desarrollan frenéticos ejercicios de agresión contra la RPDC para atacarla preventiva y sorpresivamente introduciendo los medios de ataque nuclear de toda índole y cientos de miles de uniformados, pese a la fuerte protesta y rechazo del interior y exterior del país. 
					
					El EPC ya ha aclarado su posición de principios frente a las maniobras provocativas de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas títeres surcoreanos que se tornan cada día más imprudentes. 
					
					Si los imperialistas yanquis y los traidores surcoreanos provocan finalmente la guerra de agresión contra la RPDC, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias aniquilarán de un solo golpe a los invasores y lograrán sin falta la causa histórica de la reunificación de la patria, explotando todo el poderío inagotable del ejército revolucionario del monte Paektu.
